alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Guilford; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 4:01PM EDT until July 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Alamance County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Randolph County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Guilford County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 401 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elon, or near Burlington, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Burlington, Graham, Elon, Gibsonville, Liberty, Alamance, Staley, Lake Mackintosh Marina, Lake Guilford Mackintosh Marina and Snow Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
